comment.shortText:
A class that keeps track of a key string. We use a full class here because we
want to be able to use them as keys in `WeakMap` objects.
`CustomElementProps` are passed to the `renderElement` handler.
`CustomMarkProps` are passed to the `renderMark` handler.
The `InsertDataCommand` inserts content from a `DataTransfer` object.
The `ReactCommand` union for all commands that the React plugins defines.

children.name: EDITOR_TO_CONTEXT_LISTENER

comment.shortText: Associate the context change listener with the editor.

children.defaultValue:
new WeakMap<
  Editor,
  (children: Node[], operations: Operation[]) => void
>()

comment.shortText:
Weak maps that allow us to go between Slate nodes and DOM nodes. These
are used to resolve DOM event-related logic into Slate actions.
A React context for sharing the `Editor` class.
A React context for sharing the `focused` state of the editor.
Weak maps for storing editor-related state.

Two weak maps that allow us rebuild a path given a node. They are populated
at render time such that after a render occurs we can always backtrack.

context whenever changes occur.

is a mutable singleton so it won't ever register as "changed" otherwise.
